name: SWAP PUZZLE
description:
Swap Puzzle is a continuous picture puzzle game that brings a new perspective to the picture puzzle experience.

  • Swap between puzzle pieces to fix a picture
  • Win Gem stones, Unlock levels.
  • Play in time, swap, Hybrid, free and Rookie mode
  • Win awards as you complete challenges.
  • Capture a photo and play instantly

Download and Enjoy!.

Do well to give us feedback.
